tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Partha Dental Suncity for my tooth ache pain. Doctor Sindhu immediately attended my case without any waiting time. She diagnosed end to end for the exact issue and explained me the exact reason for my issue and started treatment immediately. She completed entire root canal procedure in such a way that I didn’t feel pain at all. She also explained me about the benefits of the zirconium caps and I am using them now with ease. She also identified other issues in my teeth and made me understand the importance of taking care of my teeth and done laser cleaning of all my teeth. Thank you Doctor Sindhu for resolving my teeth pain issue forever and for taking extra care & hospitality during the entire treatment process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
